description:
In this ToP Tip series, I'm sharing some of my recently developed favourite paint recipes. Today's post is all about Sekhar, Fang of Nuhlamia. I'll reveal how I painted her dark grey undead flesh and her serpentine familiar Ouboroth.

The post ToP Tip: 3 quick guides for painting Sekhar and Ouboroth appeared first on Tale of Painters.
title: ToP Tip: 3 quick guides for painting Sekhar and Ouboroth
